name: Annihilation Scholar
desc: After characters are attacked, receives 2 Annihilation Form(s). After launching a Counter, receives 1 Annihilation Form(s). When a character possesses 6 Annihilation Form(s), removes all Annihilation Forms from them and increases their Ultimate DMG dealt by 150% until the end of the turn, as well as dealing Additional DMG equal to 650% of the character's ATK to all enemies. This DMG is considered as Ultimate DMG.
